Inaugural Event of Elmezzi APSA Local Chapter

An exciting event! As the recently established Elmezzi APSA Local Chapter, our inaugural event was with Dr. Kevin Tracey. He talked about his journey in being a physician-scientist, his advices to the trainees and the work he has done through the years. He also shared his vision for the future of bioelectronic medicine.

Couldn't have asked for a better speaker at the inaugural @APSAElmezzi event as @KevinJTraceyMD talks about his career path and offers his advice to aspiring #physicianscientists. Mark your calendars! Nov 16th at 4PM at https://t.co/qWAq87Ja7s pic.twitter.com/hAbrnbG3TG

— APSAElmezzi (@APSAElmezzi) November 9, 2021
